name: Yagra Stonefist
description: A tough-as-nails half-orc mercenary with a muscular build and a challenging gaze. She spends her time at the Yawning Portal looking for her next paying job. She is blunt, confident, and always ready to prove her strength.
personality_traits: Values strength and action over words
ideals: Strength: 'Prove your worth with your fists, not your mouth.'
Independence: 'I'm my own boss. I fight for who I want, when I want.'
Fairness: 'A deal's a deal. You pay, I fight. Simple.'
bonds: Her reputation as a reliable and tough sellsword.
A secret loyalty to the Zhentarim, who give her steady work.
The thrill of a good fight.
flaws: Arrogant and quick to dismiss those she perceives as weak.
Her first solution to any problem is usually violence.
Can be easily goaded into a challenge or a fight.
motivations: To earn gold and renown as a mercenary.
To find worthy opponents to test her skills against.
To fulfill her obligations to her employers in the Zhentarim.

canned_conversations.greeting: (Looks you up and down with a smirk) You look like you could use some muscle. Or maybe you just want to arm wrestle? Hope you're stronger than you look.
canned_conversations.ask_about_work: I fight for coin. Got a job? State your terms. Don't waste my time.
canned_conversations.lose_an_arm_wrestle: Hah! Not bad. You're stronger than you look. I'll give you that.
